channel.title: Need a Coding partner
channel.description:
Hello, i am looking for a coding partner to make a new server with. I know some coding but there are things that i can't do, i'm looking for a coder maybe doesn't know that much stuff but can still do things. I use a mac and can't get a server of my own, but i can edit the client.java file. So basically he does most of the coding, about 75 percent i would say, and i would do things like adding monsters, NPC's, shops etc. Also i will make forums and such. Anyone want to be my coder in crime? Thanks for reading.
[u]These are the things i have done:[/u]
[ul][li]created training zone with 10 monsters and drops[/li] [li]created multiple shops[/li] [li]and more...[/li][/ul]

item.title: Need a Coding partner
item.dc:creator: @K0_D3ni3d K0 D3ni3d™
item.description:
@K0_D3ni3d wrote:

bhpkyeah:

I dont get how u host a server for someone else…

In most cases a guy/gal would send the class files through msn or upload it on something like uppit or filefront. Then the hoster would run the classes. But a smart person would rename the classes with a obfuscator or w/e

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Coding partner
item.dc:creator: @K0_D3ni3d K0 D3ni3d™
item.description:
@K0_D3ni3d wrote:

I’m John, the creator of the failure known as philosopher isle.

If your willing to help me with the easy shit I’m too buisy to do or if you are willing to learn we will get along fine. Add my msn JohnNc_A@hotmail.com it auto accepts so as soon as I see you we can talk on what base I decided and how we’ll get things started.

If you don’t think things will work, good luck.

-John

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Coding partner
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“Sun Burner, post:5, topic:192389”][quote author=Lusfr link=topic=256139.msg2131692#msg2131692 date=1206342068]
You can host server on mac dumbass
[/quote]
Don’t call me a dumbass, and i have tried but i failed, please go post your useless things somewhere else,
i said i needed a coder not a fagget.[/quote]

FYI i’m not a fagget since i am not a type of cigarettes. Dumb ass learn what your words mean. You need to visit the Java site and learn more information about it since you obviously have no idea, what you are doing. Java is a corss-platform programming language.

Good day and I laugh at your stupidity

Read full topic
